features_list.feature_1: Instant Reading: No installation or sign-up. Just upload your book and start reading.
features_list.feature_2: Privacy First: Your files are processed in your browser and are never uploaded to our servers.
features_list.feature_3: Fully Customizable: Adjust font size, line height, and reading modes for your comfort.
features_list.feature_4: Mobile Ready: Enjoy a seamless reading experience on your desktop, tablet, or smartphone.
features_list.feature_5: Fast & Efficient: Built with modern technology to be quick and responsive.
features_list.feature_6: TOC Navigation: Instantly jump to any chapter with an easy-to-use table of contents.

how_it_works_title: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps

how_it_works_steps.step_1: Click 'Upload a Book' and select an EPUB file from your device.
how_it_works_steps.step_2: Your book instantly opens in a clean, distraction-free reader.
how_it_works_steps.step_3: Use the menu to customize your reading experience and navigate chapters.

faq_items.a1: Yes, ePub Reader is completely free with no ads or hidden costs. Our goal is to provide a simple, accessible reading tool for everyone.
faq_items.q2: Are my books safe? Are they stored anywhere?
faq_items.a2: Your privacy is our top priority. Your files are never uploaded or stored on our servers. They are opened and processed directly in your web browser.
faq_items.q3: What devices can I use this on?
faq_items.a3: As a web-based application, this reader works on any device with a modern web browser, including desktops (Windows, macOS, Linux), tablets (iPad, Android), and smartphones (iPhone, Android).
